stacks.name: Turing Stack
stacks.description: Inspired by Alan Turing, the pioneer of computer science and the Turing Machine; a tribute to innovation and deductive reasoning.

stacks.name: Euler Stack
stacks.description: Named after Leonhard Euler, celebrated for his contributions to mathematics; this stack emphasizes elegant solutions and deep analytical thought.

stacks.name: Shannon Stack
stacks.description: Celebrating Claude Shannon, the architect of modern digital communication and information theory; perfect for data-driven projects.

stacks.name: Gauss Stack
stacks.description: Honoring Carl Friedrich Gauss, a central figure in both statistics and number theory; designed for projects requiring precise numerical computation.

stacks.name: Diffie-Stack
stacks.description: Inspired by the Diffie-Hellman key exchange, this stack champions secure cryptographic practices and innovative key handling.

stacks.name: Gödel Stack
stacks.description: Named after Kurt Gödel, whose work on incompleteness reshaped logic; this stack pushes the boundaries of theoretical exploration in computing.
